pages.privacy-policy: FleetWheels Privacy Policy - Understand How We Protect Your Information FleetWheels Home About us Services Contacts Privacy Policy FleetWheels respects the privacy of its users and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our website and services. **Information We Collect:** We collect various types of information when you use our website and services, including: Personal information: This may include your name, email address, phone number, driver's license information, and payment information. Usage data: We collect information about how you use our website and services, such as the pages you visit, the rentals you book, and your search queries. Device information: We collect information about the device you use to access our website, such as your IP address, device type, and operating system. **How We Use Your Information:** We use your information for various purposes, including: To provide and improve our website and services. To process your rental bookings and transactions. To communicate with you about your rentals and other services. To personalize your experience on our website. To send you marketing communications (with your consent). **Disclosure of Your Information:** We may disclose your information to third-party service providers who help us operate our website and services. We will only disclose your information to these providers for the purpose of performing their services and under strict contractual obligations to protect your privacy. **Your Choices:** You have choices regarding your information. You can: Access and update your personal information. Opt out of receiving marketing communications. **Data Retention:** We will retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. **Security:** We take reasonable steps to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website or internet transmission is completely secure. We cannot guarantee the security of your information. **Changes to this Privacy Policy:** We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our website. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates. The FleetWheels website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline FleetWheels Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Home About Us Services Contact Us

pages.terms-conditions: FleetWheels Terms and Conditions - Guidelines for Using Our Taxi Services FleetWheels Home About us Services Contacts Terms and Conditions Welcome to FleetWheels! By using our taxi services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions: 1. Service Availability Our taxi services are available for booking subject to availability in your area. We strive to provide timely and reliable transportation, but cannot guarantee uninterrupted service at all times. 2. Booking and Cancellation You may book a taxi through our website or mobile app. Cancellation policies apply and may vary based on the type of booking and timing. Please review our cancellation policy before making a booking. 3. Fare and Payment Fares for our taxi services may vary based on factors such as distance, time of day, and demand. Payment methods accepted may include credit/debit cards, cash, or digital wallets. 4. Passenger Conduct Passengers are expected to behave respectfully towards our drivers and other passengers. Any misconduct or violation of our terms may result in denial of service. 5. Liability While we take utmost care to ensure the safety and security of our passengers, FleetWheels shall not be liable for any damages, injuries, or losses incurred during the use of our taxi services. By using our taxi services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms and conditions. If you have any questions or concerns regarding our terms and conditions, please contact us. The FleetWheels website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline FleetWheels Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Home About Us Services Contact Us
